thread.title: 'Jeopardy!' Contestant Gets Away With Flipping Off Trebek ... And America
thread.title_full: 'Jeopardy!' Contestant Gets Away With Flipping Off Trebek ... And America

author: Bill Bradley
title: 'Jeopardy!' Contestant Gets Away With Flipping Off Trebek ... And America
text:
'Jeopardy!' Contestant Gets Away With Flipping Off Trebek ... And America What is ... ballsy? By Bill Bradley 
‚Äú Jeopardy !‚Äù just had its most hostile contestant since Sean Connery appeared on the ‚ÄúSaturday Night Live‚Äù version. 
During a ‚ÄúJeopardy‚Äù College Championship match that aired Tuesday, host Alex Trebek thought he was asking contestant Viraj Mehta a simple question about pizza. 
This prompt would allow the Stanford student to launch into a hilarious anecdote, amusing the host and America. 
But the joke was on us ... Not realizing he's giving us all the finger @Jeopardy pic.twitter.com/lKPm51sF71 
What is ... he doing with that finger? 
It didn‚Äôt take long for Twitter to catch on. Holy crap this dude on Jeopardy just gave America the finger for a solid 7-10 seconds pic.twitter.com/ilElMdyGrQ ‚Äî Jackie Treehorn (@BeerMeABeer) February 22, 2017 Well play Stanford. Giving the one finger salute while telling Alex how to fold pizza and eat it. #jeopardy #stanford #onefingersalute pic.twitter.com/W90ITERTUZ ‚Äî Adam Ozment (@Vols_Junkie) February 22, 2017 Dude on Jeopardy just gave everyone the middle finger @KFCBarstool @barstoolsports pic.twitter.com/hmR9hMSMep ‚Äî Mike Pascarella (@PASCin_Robbins) February 22, 2017 "HEY VIRAJ, BET YOU WONT GIVE THE MIDDLE FINGER ON JEOPARDY!" ‚Äî kentucky wildmaks (@bigmakball) February 22, 2017 
Was it intentional? 
As some on Twitter point out, Mehta held his finger out for about 7 seconds. If it‚Äôs not intentional, that guy is just asking for a finger cramp for no reason. Stanford flipping Trebek the bird üò≥ #jeopardy pic.twitter.com/rSxtt12yBt ‚Äî Katie Logan (@KatieLLogan) February 22, 2017 
The college student joins the long line of contestants going viral for their antics on the show, including writing their final answers as ‚Äú This handsome gentlemen ‚Äù and the great ‚Äú Turd Ferguson .‚Äù 
Mehta won the game, so there could be more hijinks on the way. 
Trebek has gone viral lately for rapping on the show . Perhaps as a response he‚Äôll take the advice of the real Slim Shady and put one of those fingers on each hand up.
